resources.string: Harry Potter\'s summer has included the worst birthday ever, doomy warnings from a house-elf called Dobby, and rescue from the Dursleys by his friend Ron Weasley in a magical flying car! Back at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft And Wizardry for his second year, Harry hears strange whispers echo through empty corridors â€“ and then the attacks start. Students are found as though turned to stone... Dobby\'s sinister predictions seem to be coming true.
